CustomField.description: Question Created by the Survey Builder
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Do you run any ‘off-cycle’ payrolls? We will need to be notified of ALL ‘off-cycle’ payrolls you run within your payroll platform so that we know to pull the file and upload it. *Off-cycle = A bonus check, new hire employee single pay period, etc.
CustomField.label: EPS Off Cycle
